contentrichtext.text: Article [[Randy Heit]] listed on [[WP:VFD]] Apr 24 to Apr 30 2004. Only vote to keep was mine so I changed my mind and deleted per consensus. Discussion: Insignificant, although I happen to like ZDoom. [[User:Fredrik|Fredrik]] 22:00, 24 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Marginal keep. Google gives 337 hits for ''Randy Heit zdoom'' though in the first list of ten there's already a copy of the wiki article. Unfortunately I don't know enough about the subject to say any more than that. -- [[User:Francs2000|Graham :)]] | [[User talk:Francs2000|Talk]] 21:47, 25 Apr 2004 (UTC) **Should Wikipedia have an article on every person developing a piece of software who is mentioned more than 300 times on the Internet? Well, perhaps... [[User:Fredrik|Fredrik]] 18:27, 26 Apr 2004 (UTC) ***I did say '''marginal''' keep. As I say I don't know the subject. If I'm wrong then vote to delete as is your right. -- [[User:Francs2000|Graham :)]] | [[User talk:Francs2000|Talk]] 21:27, 26 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Delete. [[User:Postdlf|Postdlf]] 4:23 27 Apr 2004 (UTC) ''End discussion''
